topic.title: Teams
topic.p: Within organizations, you can create teams for grouping users around dedicated projects. Here are some basic advantages of using teams:

list.li: You can combine several projects under a single team to provide a convenient way for navigation.
You can share specific projects among Qodana Cloud users that are part of a team.

topic.p: To start working with teams, you need to navigate to the organization. You can do this by expanding the list of organizations in the left corner of the Qodana Cloud UI, and selecting the required organization.

chapter.title: Create a team
chapter.p: Currently, you can create teams only outside your private organization.

step.p: On the organization page, click Create team in the upper-right corner.
This will open the New team window.
In the New team window, specify the team name and click Create team.

chapter.title: Navigate to teams
chapter.p: You can navigate to teams using either the organization page or the left sidebar of the Qodana Cloud UI.

topic.chapter:
Each team can be managed using the menu available in the upper-right corner.
Click Invite members to invite or delete members, or change user roles for the existing members.
Click Archive team if you wish to delete (archive) the team..
